name: SHRI MHASOBA GRAMVIKAS PRATISHTHAN
briefDescription: Shri Mhasoba Gramvikas Pratishthan (SMGP) - a registered charitable non-profit youth society and trust in Mar-2013. SMGP a grass root level NGO working on multidisciplinary and integrated developments which are focused on single village as a model and pilot project. This pilot village project is planned as scalable model for 30 village cluster of similar social ecosystem. This will be reaching drought prone > 20,000 houses or families, >1,00,000 population and half of the Malshiras tehsil of Solapur district in Maharashtra state of India.SMGP Mission: Act as a catalyst to realize sustainable rural transformation through local youth and people participation and use of innovative technological solutions towards creating rural ecosystem.
